Class DaytimeUdp

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaytimeUdp

  • public class DaytimeUdp
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the Daytime Protocol - This class uses UDP to send a packet to the server in which the server will respond with the date and time.
    Version:
    Oct 1, 2018
    Author:
    Kevin Filanowski

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int portNumber
      The port number to access, by default it will be 13 (RFC Standard).
      private java.lang.String server
      The server to send packets to.

    • Method Detail

      • go

        public void go(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main operator of the program. This will open a datagram socket and send UDP packets to a server, in which we will print the response which will be the date and time.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
